lead_paragraph: Smartphones have replaced lots of other accessories — cameras, flashlights, calculators. But many people are still reluctant to swap the wallets in their pockets for their digital counterparts.
snippet: Smartphones have replaced lots of other accessories — cameras, flashlights, calculators. But many people are still reluctant to swap the wallets in their pockets for their digital counterparts....

headline.main: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches
headline.print_headline: World Cup Fans Will Need Special Identity Cards for Matches
